User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the ClipStream application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the User entity.

profilePictureUrl.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

bio.description: A short biography or description of the user.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the user account was created.

Video.title: Video
Video.description: Represents a video post in the application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Video entity.

userId.description: Reference to the User who created the Video.

username.description: Username of the user who posted the video.

userProfileUrl.description: URL of the profile picture of the user who posted.

videoUrl.description: URL of the uploaded video file.

song.description: The name of the song used in the video.

likes.description: An array of user IDs who have liked the video.

comments.description: An array of comment objects on the video.

shares.description: Number of shares of the video.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the video was created.

Comment.title: Comment
Comment.description: Represents a comment on a Video.

userId.description: Reference to the User who posted the comment.

username.description: Username of the user who posted the comment.

userProfileUrl.description: Profile picture of the user who posted the comment.

text.description: The text content of the comment.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the comment was created.

definition.description: Stores all video posts. This top-level collection allows for easy querying of all videos for the main feed.
